Package org.opengrok.indexer.search

Class QueryBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opengrok.indexer.search.QueryBuilder
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SuggesterQueryBuilder
    public class QueryBuilder
extends Object
    Helper class that builds a Lucene query based on provided search terms for the different fields.

      static String normalizeDirPath​(String path)
      Transform path to ensure any File.separatorChar is represented as '/', that there is a trailing '/' if path is not empty, and then hash using SHA-1 and formatted in a private encoding using only letters [g-u].

      • normalizeDirPath

        public static String normalizeDirPath​(String path)
        Transform path to ensure any File.separatorChar is represented as '/', that there is a trailing '/' if path is not empty, and then hash using SHA-1 and formatted in a private encoding using only letters [g-u].
        Parameters:
        path - a defined value
        Returns:
        a defined, transformed value

      • getQueries

        public Map<String,​String> getQueries()
        Get a map containing the query text for each of the fields that have been set.
        Returns:
        a possible empty map.

      • getContextFields

        public List<String> getContextFields()
        Gets a list of fields from getQueries() which are extracted from source text and which therefore can be used for context presentations -- in the order of most specific to least.
        Returns:
        a defined, possibly-empty list

      • getSize

        public int getSize()
        Get the number of query fields set.
        Returns:
        the current number of fields with a none-empty query string.

      • isDefSearch

        public boolean isDefSearch()
        Used to tell if this search only has the DEFS field filled in.
        Returns:
        whether above statement is true or false

      • isPathSearch

        public boolean isPathSearch()
        Gets a value indicating if this search only has defined the PATH query field.

      • build

        public org.apache.lucene.search.Query build()
                                     throws org.apache.lucene.queryparser.classic.ParseException
        Build a new query based on the query text that has been passed in to this builder.
        Returns:
        a query, or null if no query text is available.
        Throws:
        org.apache.lucene.queryparser.classic.ParseException - if the query text cannot be parsed

      • buildQuery

        protected org.apache.lucene.search.Query buildQuery​(String field,
                                                    String queryText)
                                             throws org.apache.lucene.queryparser.classic.ParseException
        Build a subquery against one of the fields.
        Parameters:
        field - the field to build the query against
        queryText - the query text
        Returns:
        a parsed query
        Throws:
        org.apache.lucene.queryparser.classic.ParseException - if the query text cannot be parsed
